articles.title: Boston? Too expensive. Quincy as well. But for many homebuyers, South Coast is just right.
articles.description:
MATTAPOISETT – Carolyn Simcoe was once a Bostonian, but she moved to Quincy and then with her husband to Plymouth, in search of lower rents and more space. Ultimately, though, they had to move even farther south, to Mattapoisett, to find a house that they loved and could actually afford to buy. “We moved further […]
